probability.last_reasoning: Bear case increased from 10% to 12%: RLUSD contraction, extreme fear, and worsening macro stress reduce confidence in near-term institutional momentum. Base narrowed slightly from 40% to 42% as the $2-8 range becomes the most likely outcome given stalling metrics. Mid reduced from 38% to 35% — the acceleration required for mid-case outcomes is not materializing in current data. Bull trimmed from 12% to 11% — no new catalysts support the aggressive scenario.

bear_case.score_reasoning: RLUSD contraction, persistent data gaps on ODL/ETF/DEX, and extreme fear environment create genuine thesis execution risk. Competing infrastructure continues advancing. Score reflects real uncertainty — not thesis failure, but measurable erosion of the acceleration narrative.

competing_infrastructure.name: SWIFT GPI
competing_infrastructure.status_text: SWIFT continues expanding GPI to 150+ countries with same-day settlement. No urgency to migrate to blockchain rails when incremental improvements satisfy most institutional needs.

competing_infrastructure.name: Visa B2B Connect
competing_infrastructure.status_text: Limited traction in cross-border settlement niche. Not a credible near-term threat to XRPL institutional positioning.

competing_infrastructure.name: JPMorgan Kinexys
competing_infrastructure.status_text: Kinexys processes $2B+/day in interbank transfers on proprietary blockchain. JPMorgan's distribution advantage and existing client relationships make this the most credible competing infrastructure for institutional settlement.

competing_infrastructure.name: BIS Project Nexus
competing_infrastructure.status_text: Nexus connecting domestic fast payment systems could bypass blockchain entirely for cross-border settlement. Kill switch 9 specifically tracks this risk. No confirmed XRPL integration.

competing_infrastructure.name: Ethereum Institutional
competing_infrastructure.status_text: Ethereum L2 ecosystem expanding with institutional DeFi protocols. BlackRock BUIDL fund on Ethereum demonstrates institutional preference for ETH ecosystem in tokenized assets. XRPL must prove superior throughput and cost advantages in production.

bear_case.odl_stagnation: Complete absence of verifiable ODL volume data for 3+ months is the single most dangerous thesis gap — a $25B target with zero visibility is indistinguishable from a $0 reality until proven otherwise.
bear_case.token_velocity_concern: Token velocity data (kill switch 8) remains UNKNOWN. If XRP is being used purely as a transit currency with sub-second hold times, price appreciation from utility alone is structurally limited regardless of volume growth.

macro_headwinds.name: Global Recession Risk
macro_headwinds.status_text: Fear & Greed at 14, tariff uncertainty, and Japan stress compound to create genuine recession risk that would freeze institutional adoption timelines across all new infrastructure.

macro_headwinds.name: Crypto Winter Signals
macro_headwinds.status_text: Extreme fear at 14 is consistent with early crypto winter readings but insufficient alone to confirm. ETF flow data needed to assess institutional conviction vs. retail capitulation.

macro_headwinds.name: Regulatory Reversal Risk
macro_headwinds.status_text: Clarity Act pending but current administration is crypto-favorable. Section 122 tariff expiration in July could shift legislative priorities away from crypto framework bills.

macro_headwinds.name: Rate Hike Extension
macro_headwinds.status_text: US 10Y at 4.02% suggests rate cut expectations are muted. Extended restrictive policy compresses institutional risk appetite for new infrastructure deployments.

bear_case.bear_narrative: The XRP institutional settlement thesis is flying blind on its three most important demand metrics — ODL volume, ETF AUM, and permissioned DEX adoption all show null data — while seven previously untracked threats have been identified, including the critical finding that stablecoin interoperability protocols are commoditizing the exact corridor settlement function XRP was designed to monopolize. The Fear & Greed kill switch has triggered at 14 with JPY carry unwind risk compounding, and the newly discovered RLUSD cannibalization paradox means Ripple's own success may structurally decouple from XRP token demand. Recommendation is REDUCE_EXPOSURE — partial de-risk immediately, resolve data gaps on ODL and ETF flows before re-entering full position.
